items.title: Act fast: Fly Delta to Dublin, Madrid and Marrakech from 26K SkyMiles each way
items.description: Delta Air Lines is offering 20% off SkyMiles award travel to transatlantic destinations including Amsterdam, Barcelona, Madrid and Marrakech.

items.description: Everything you need to know about tipping and service charge policies at major cruise lines.

items.description: World of Hyatt's "Bonus Journeys" promotion is back, and members can earn up to 28,000 points.
